text: {"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"14","subject":"Remove dead code from check.py (uuid, SITE_NAMES)","description":"Remove unused import `uuid` and unused constant `SITE_NAMES` from check.py after verifying they are truly unused.","assignedBy":"be-check","timestamp":"2026-02-09T09:08:24.728Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"15","subject":"Unify site_code validation in check.py","description":"Make get_check_urls use _validate_site_code() instead of separate inline validation logic.","assignedBy":"be-check","timestamp":"2026-02-09T09:08:39.513Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"17","subject":"Extract shared URL generation to check_urls.py","description":"Create backend/utils/check_urls.py with build_check_urls() and refactor both check.py and check_playwright.py to use it.","assignedBy":"be-check","timestamp":"2026-02-09T09:08:57.059Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"18","subject":"Extract navigation pattern in check_playwright.py","description":"Create _check_with_navigation() template method to consolidate navigate→screenshot→check pattern from check_page_load, check_text_presence, check_text_absence, check_subtitles.","assignedBy":"be-check","timestamp":"2026-02-09T09:10:18.900Z"}
